page.title: 13Parents Today
page.content: {Years}ago we would not have parents like we have today.{Years}ago we would not get as much{attention}because families would be very{big.}They would have many children. My teacher's mother-in-law had 10 brothers and sisters. Also you would not spend much time with your parents because you would have a nurse, if you were rich. If you weren't rich you would play in the{street.}These days we only have{ {small}families and we go to{playgroup. We do not have a nurse. We spend more time with our parents so we are very different from people years ago.
